employees.permissionsDescription: These are the rights and access that the employee has within the platform, depending on their assigned role.

employees.securityRecommendationText: Two-factor authentication is strongly recommended for all users, especially for those with administrative access.
employees.activityLogDescription: Recent actions performed by or affecting this employee.
employees.resetPasswordDescription: This will send a password reset link to the employee's email address.
employees.deleteEmployeeDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this employee? This action cannot be undone.
employees.deleteEmployeeWarning: All data associated with this employee will be permanently removed. This includes:
